there was no evidence of effect at six months postpartum. The timing of the intervention in 
this single study was from two weeks postpartum until 12 weeks postpartum. Educational 
interventions also demonstrated effect at three months postpartum, but again there was 
no evidence of effect at six months or overall. The intervention in these studies occurred
